attributes.action: Give even more of my money to failed buisnesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst encouraging signs can be taken from the governments bailing out of such institutions as banks who gambled on mortgages and shareholders who invested in the railways; it is about time that really needy multi millionaire business men who fail to make their various companies work should be given the help they need from us tax payers. I propose that taxes are increased even more to help the rich get richer, more benefits are paid to those who need it least and knighthoods all round for those who really do a good job of bankrupting companies. We wouldn't want a free market to actually mean free would we.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
